snippet: In a bid to clean up one of the nation’s dirtiest coal-fired power plants without causing economic harm to the Navajo Nation, which surrounds it, the Environmental Protection Agency is giving the plant’s owners five extra years.
lead_paragraph: In a bid to clean up one of the nation’s dirtiest coal-fired power plants without causing economic harm to the Navajo Nation, which surrounds it, the Environmental Protection Agency is giving the plant’s owners five extra years.
